types.label: PTE RA
types.title: Read Aloud
types.introduction: RA在练习时主要做到单词发音的准确及断句上面的注意，此题分值大对阅读分数有较高影响，机经命中率中等。
types.instruction: Look at the text below. In 40 seconds, you must read this text aloud as naturally and clearly as possible. You have 40 seconds to read aloud.

types.label: PTE RS
types.title: Repeat Sentence
types.introduction: RS在练习时主要做到单词发音的准确及流利度的保证，此题分值大对口语及听力影响很高，机经命中率较低。
types.instruction: You will hear a sentence. Please repeat the sentence exactly as you hear it. You will hear the sentence only once.

types.label: PTE DI
types.title: Describe Image
types.introduction: DI在练习时一定做到模板的熟练套用及流利读的保证，此题机经命中率较高，平时练习以机经题目为主，按图片种类突破练习。
types.instruction: Look at the graph below. In 25 seconds, please speak into the microphone and describe in detail what the graph is showing. You will have 40 seconds to give your response.

types.label: PTE RL
types.title: Re-tell Lecture
types.introduction: RL在练习时主要做到关键词的提取和模板的熟练套用，流利度必须保证，此题机经命中率高，平时练习以机经题目为主。
types.instruction: You will hear a lecture. After listening to the lecture, in 10 seconds, please speak into the microphone and retell what you have just heard from the lecture in your own words. You will have 40 seconds to give your response.

types.label: PTE ASQ
types.title: Answer Short Question
types.introduction: ASQ在练习时主要做到对生词发音的熟练，分值虽小但题目数量较多，因此不可轻视。此题机经命中率较高，可以考前集中过机经。
types.instruction: You will hear a question. Please give a simple and short answer. Often just one or a few words is enough.

types.label: PTE SST
types.title: Summarize Spoken Text
types.introduction: SST在练习时主要做到对关键信息的提取，拼写和语法的检查不可忽略；此题分值大对听力影响很高，机经命中率高，平时练习以机经题目为主。
types.instruction: You will hear a short report. Write a summary for a fellow student who was not present. You should write 50-70 words. You have 10 minutes to finish this task. Your response will be judged on the quality of your writing and on how well your response presents the key points presented in the lecture.

types.label: PTE WFD
types.title: Write From Dictation
types.introduction: WFD在练习时一定注意拼写，考试可试词；此题分值非常大对听力和写作影响很高，机经命中率很高，平时练习以机经为主，题库数量较多高频优先。
types.instruction: You will hear a sentence. Type the sentence in the box below exactly as you hear it. Write as much of the sentence as you can. You will hear the sentence only once.

types.label: PTE SWT
types.title: Summarize Written Text
types.introduction: SWT在练习时注意对主旨句的提取，5-75个词一句话写完。此题分值较大，机经命中率高。
types.instruction: Read the passage below and summarize it using one sentence. Type your response in the box at the bottom of the screen. You have 10 minutes to finish this task. Your response will be judged on the quality of your writing and on how well your response presents the key points in the passage.

types.label: PTE WE
types.title: Write Essay
types.introduction: WE在练习时注意对模板的熟练套用以及打字速度的练习，200-300字要求。此题分值较大，机经命中率高。
types.instruction: You will have 20 minutes to plan, write and revise an essay about the topic below. Your response will be judged on how well you develop a position, organize your ideas, present supporting details, and control the elements of standard written English. You should write 200-300 words.

types.label: PTE FIB_RW
types.title: Fill in Blanks（FIB_RW）
types.introduction: FIB_RW在练习时不要只做空词的记忆，考试时会有“换空”情况，尽量通篇阅读文章并理解，PTE阅读词汇较难需多积累；此题机经命中率中等，练习以机经为主。
types.instruction: In the text below some words are missing. Drag words from the box below to the appropriate place in the text. To undo an answer choice, drag the word back to the box below the text.

types.label: PTE RO
types.title: Re-order Paragraphs
types.introduction: RO在练习时多注意排序技巧的熟练,段落上下文关联词的提示和记忆; 此题机经命中率中等,练习机经时多做生词积累。
types.instruction: The text boxes in the left panel have been placed in a random order. Restore the original order by dragging the text boxes from the left panel to the right panel.

types.label: PTE FIB_R
types.title: Fill in the blanks（FIB_R）
types.introduction: FIB_R在练习时不要只做空词的记忆，考试时会有“换空”情况，尽量通篇阅读文章并理解，PTE阅读词汇较难需多积累；此题机经命中率中等，练习以机经为主。
types.instruction: In the text below some words are missing. Drag words from the box below to the appropriate place in the text. To undo an answer choice, drag the word back to the box below the text.

PTE_RA.title: Read Aloud
PTE_RA.introduction: RA在练习时主要做到单词发音的准确及断句上面的注意，此题分值大对阅读分数有较高影响，机经命中率中等。
PTE_RA.instruction: Look at the text below. In 40 seconds, you must read this text aloud as naturally and clearly as possible. You have 40 seconds to read aloud.

PTE_RS.introduction: RS在练习时主要做到单词发音的准确及流利度的保证，此题分值大对口语及听力影响很高，机经命中率较低。
PTE_RS.instruction: You will hear a sentence. Please repeat the sentence exactly as you hear it. You will hear the sentence only once.

PTE_RL.introduction: RL在练习时主要做到关键词的提取和模板的熟练套用，流利度必须保证，此题机经命中率高，平时练习以机经题目为主。
PTE_RL.instruction: You will hear a lecture. After listening to the lecture, in 10 seconds, please speak into the microphone and retell what you have just heard from the lecture in your own words. You will have 40 seconds to give your response.

PTE_RO.label: PTE RO
PTE_RO.title: Re-order Paragraphs
PTE_RO.introduction: RO在练习时多注意排序技巧的熟练,段落上下文关联词的提示和记忆; 此题机经命中率中等,练习机经时多做生词积累。
PTE_RO.instruction: The text boxes in the left panel have been placed in a random order. Restore the original order by dragging the text boxes from the left panel to the right panel.

PTE_DI.label: PTE DI
PTE_DI.title: Describe Image
PTE_DI.introduction: DI在练习时一定做到模板的熟练套用及流利读的保证，此题机经命中率较高，平时练习以机经题目为主，按图片种类突破练习。
PTE_DI.instruction: Look at the graph below. In 25 seconds, please speak into the microphone and describe in detail what the graph is showing. You will have 40 seconds to give your response.

PTE_WE.label: PTE WE
PTE_WE.title: Write Essay
PTE_WE.introduction: WE在练习时注意对模板的熟练套用以及打字速度的练习，200-300字要求。此题分值较大，机经命中率高。
PTE_WE.instruction: You will have 20 minutes to plan, write and revise an essay about the topic below. Your response will be judged on how well you develop a position, organize your ideas, present supporting details, and control the elements of standard written English. You should write 200-300 words.

PTE_ASQ.label: PTE ASQ
PTE_ASQ.title: Answer Short Question
PTE_ASQ.introduction: ASQ在练习时主要做到对生词发音的熟练，分值虽小但题目数量较多，因此不可轻视。此题机经命中率较高，可以考前集中过机经。
PTE_ASQ.instruction: You will hear a question. Please give a simple and short answer. Often just one or a few words is enough.

PTE_SST.label: PTE SST
PTE_SST.title: Summarize Spoken Text
PTE_SST.introduction: SST在练习时主要做到对关键信息的提取，拼写和语法的检查不可忽略；此题分值大对听力影响很高，机经命中率高，平时练习以机经题目为主。
PTE_SST.instruction: You will hear a short report. Write a summary for a fellow student who was not present. You should write 50-70 words. You have 10 minutes to finish this task. Your response will be judged on the quality of your writing and on how well your response presents the key points presented in the lecture.

PTE_SWT.label: PTE SWT
PTE_SWT.title: Summarize Written Text
PTE_SWT.introduction: SWT在练习时注意对主旨句的提取，5-75个词一句话写完。此题分值较大，机经命中率高。
PTE_SWT.instruction: Read the passage below and summarize it using one sentence. Type your response in the box at the bottom of the screen. You have 10 minutes to finish this task. Your response will be judged on the quality of your writing and on how well your response presents the key points in the passage.

PTE_WFD.label: PTE WFD
PTE_WFD.title: Write From Dictation
PTE_WFD.introduction: WFD在练习时一定注意拼写，考试可试词；此题分值非常大对听力和写作影响很高，机经命中率很高，平时练习以机经为主，题库数量较多高频优先。
PTE_WFD.instruction: You will hear a sentence. Type the sentence in the box below exactly as you hear it. Write as much of the sentence as you can. You will hear the sentence only once.

PTE_FIB_R.label: PTE FIB_R
PTE_FIB_R.title: Fill in the blanks（FIB_R）
PTE_FIB_R.introduction: FIB_R在练习时不要只做空词的记忆，考试时会有“换空”情况，尽量通篇阅读文章并理解，PTE阅读词汇较难需多积累；此题机经命中率中等，练习以机经为主。
PTE_FIB_R.instruction: In the text below some words are missing. Drag words from the box below to the appropriate place in the text. To undo an answer choice, drag the word back to the box below the text.

PTE_FIB_RW.label: PTE FIB_RW
PTE_FIB_RW.title: Fill in Blanks（FIB_RW）
PTE_FIB_RW.introduction: FIB_RW在练习时不要只做空词的记忆，考试时会有“换空”情况，尽量通篇阅读文章并理解，PTE阅读词汇较难需多积累；此题机经命中率中等，练习以机经为主。
PTE_FIB_RW.instruction: In the text below some words are missing. Drag words from the box below to the appropriate place in the text. To undo an answer choice, drag the word back to the box below the text.

PTE_R_MCS.label: PTE Reading MCS
PTE_R_MCS.title: Multiple Choice (Single)
PTE_R_MCS.instruction: Read the text and answer the multiple-choice question by selecting the correct response. Only one response is correct.

PTE_R_MCM.label: PTE Reading MCM
PTE_R_MCM.title: Multiple Choice (Multiple)
PTE_R_MCM.instruction: Read the text and answer the question by selecting all the correct responses. More than one response is correct.

PTE_L_MCS.label: PTE Listening MCS
PTE_L_MCS.title: Multiple Choice (Single)
PTE_L_MCS.instruction: Listen to the recording and answer the single-choice question by selectingthe correct response . Only one response is correct.

PTE_L_MCM.label: PTE Listening MCM
PTE_L_MCM.title: Multiple Choice (Multiple)
PTE_L_MCM.instruction: Listen to the recording and answer the question by selecting all the correct responses. You will need to select more than one response.

PTE_HCS.label: PTE HCS
PTE_HCS.title: Highlight Correct Summary
PTE_HCS.instruction: You will hear a recording. Click on the paragraph that best relates to the recording.

PTE_SMW.label: PTE SMW
PTE_SMW.title: Select Missing Word
PTE_SMW.instruction: You will hear a recording about fiction writing. At the end of the recording the lost word or group of words has been reploced by a beep. Select the correct option to complete the recording.

PTE_HIW.label: PTE HIW
PTE_HIW.title: Highlight Incorrect Words
PTE_HIW.instruction: You will hear a recording. Below is a transcription of the recording. Some words in the transcription differ from what the speaker said. Please click on the words that are different.

每周二更新

yucePage.description: 登登PTE本周真题预测，每周二更新
